{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CZ.NIC |model=Turris MOX |revision=(RTROM0X) |asin= |price=69 |est_release_date=03/27/2018 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F3720 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TC4G63CFR-PBA |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=PCIe, Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, SFP, |expansion_minipcie_num=4 |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sdcard_num=1 |expansion_sfp_num=1 |jtag=yes,, populated,, 34-pin header,, (SDIO,GPIO,I2C) |serial=yes,, populated,, 6-pin header,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_module=Compex WLE900VX |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6176 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=SIM/microSD Card slot, GPIO, SDIO, UART, I2C |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;Turris OS;OpenWrt-deriv; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Turris |default_ssid_regex=^Turris$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |oui=04:F0:21 |oui_eth=D8:58:D7 }} {{TagLine|Modular & Open-Source Router}} :[https://www.turris.cz/en/ Product page] {{•}} [https://www.turris.cz/en/specification/ Spec.] {{•}} [https://mox.turris.cz/en/overview/ Overview]
*{{WPLink|Turris Omnia}}
===Specifications=== '''Modules''': The system is comprised of a *'''MOX A''' - ''[https://mox.turris.cz/en/specification/#mox-a Basic Module]'': CPU: [[Marvell]] Armada 3720 (Dual-Core) :RAM: 512MB (DDR3), 1x USB 3.0, 1x GbE, GPIO, SDIO, UART and I2C Mini PCIe port that can currently be used by one to three modules as needed: *'''MOX B''' - ''[https://mox.turris.cz/en/specification/#mox-b Extension Module]'': for 2.4/5GHz Wi-Fi card, SSD, LTE modem *'''MOX C''' - ''[https://mox.turris.cz/en/specification/#mox-c Ethernet Module]'': with 4x GbE LAN port (RJ45) *'''MOX D''' - ''[https://mox.turris.cz/en/specification/#mox-d SFP Module]'': to connect to 2.5Gbps fiber connection (FTTH) *'''MOX E''' - ''[https://mox.turris.cz/en/specification/#mox-e Super Ethernet Module]'': with 8x GbE LAN port (RJ45) *'''MOX F''' - ''[https://mox.turris.cz/en/specification/#mox-f USB Module]'': with 4x USB 3.0 port (project) *'''MOX G''' - ''[https://mox.turris.cz/en/specification/#mox-g Super Extension Module]'': with 1x Mini PCIe (project) Additional MOX modules due straddle mount PCIe 64-pin connector: :LTE modem (miniPCIe), SSD disc (miniPCIe or M2)
===Models=== *'''Turris MOX Start''' (MOX A) - ''Router'' :[[Marvell]] Armada 3720, 512MB DDR3, GbE WAN, USB 3.0, microSD slot *'''Turris MOX Power Wi-Fi''' (MOX A + MOX B) - ''Access Point'' :[[Marvell]] Armada 3720, 512MB DDR3, GbE WAN, USB 3.0, microSD slot, :2.4/5GHz Dual-Band Wi‑Fi (2×2 2.4GHz/3×3 5GHz), SIM card slot *'''Turris MOX Classic''' (MOX A + MOX B + MOX C) - ''WiFi Router'' :[[Marvell]] Armada 3720, 512MB DDR3, GbE WAN, USB 3.0, microSD slot, :2.4/5GHz Dual-Band Wi‑Fi (2×2 2.4GHz/3×3 5GHz), SIM, 4x GbE LAN *'''Turris MOX Cloud''' (MOX A + MOX F + RAM) - ''NAS'' :[[Marvell]] Armada 3720, 1GB DDR3, GbE WAN, 5x USB 3.0, microSD slot
===News=== *[https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/turris-mox-modular-open-source-router-wifi/coming_soon ''Turris MOX'' on '''Indiegogo''' campaign] *[https://www.root.cz/clanky/turris-mox-modularni-router-si-sestavite-podle-potreby-z-jednotlivych-karet/ ''Turris MOX'' on '''root.cz'''] (internal images) *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/03/27/turris-mox-is-a-modular-router-with-wifi-ssd-lte-modem-ethernet-and-sfp-fiber-modules-crowdfunding/ ''Turris MOX'' review on '''SNX-Software'''] :CPU: [[Marvell]] ARMADA 3700LP (88F3720) • [http://www.cnx-software.com/2016/09/23/marvell-espressobin-board-with-gigabit-ethernet-sata-pcie-and-usb-3-0-to-launch-for-39-and-up-crowdfunding/ CNX] :Dual Core (ARMv8 Cortex-A53) CPU @1.2GHz
===See also=== *[[Turris Omnia]] *[https://www.turris.cz/en/news/news-list/turris-cloud-1-april-2018/ Turris Cloud] ;)
